Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line of inscription - Coptic (?), from the rim of a vessel, inside the rim painted white with four black circles.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394081) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394081)
